TITLE: As climate change threatens more homes, some properties are getting too costly to insure
SUMMARY: As climate change threatens the U.S. with more natural disasters, it's becoming increasingly costly for Americans to insure their homes, experts say.

TITLE: Where companies say they will cut budgets first in a softer economy
SUMMARY: Companies are cutting real estate footprints, and the budgets that go with them, according to a Gartner CFO survey.

TITLE: Is the economy in a recession? ‘What you call it is less relevant,’ says one economist: Here’s ‘what really matters'
SUMMARY: Are we in a recession? A former chief economist at the U.S. Department of Labor and a former chair of the White House Council of Economic Advisers weigh in.

TITLE: A 'shakeout' among mortgage lenders is coming, according to CEO of bank that left the business
SUMMARY: Surging interest rates and home prices that have yet to decline have put housing out of reach for many Americans and shut the refinance pipeline for lenders.

TITLE: ‘One actionable thing’ that can save prospective homebuyers up to $104,000 over the life of their mortgage
SUMMARY: As today's prospective home buyers confront high home prices and rising interest rates, there's one thing they can do to save – raise their credit scores

TITLE: Two Trump children questioned in New York attorney general's probe, ex-president set to talk in coming weeks, report says
SUMMARY: The Trump Organization is under investigation for manipulating asset valuations for financial gain. Three Trump children have now been questioned in the probe.

TITLE: The great unrest: How 2020 changed the economy in ways we can't understand yet
SUMMARY: Because of the Covid pandemic, 2020 was an epoch-changing year. Much like the 9/11 terrorist attacks in 2001, the full effects won't be understood for years.

TITLE: Mortgage applications inch up for the first time in five weeks
SUMMARY: Total mortgage demand increased 1.2% as the average 30-year fixed mortgage rate made the largest weekly drop since 2020.

TITLE: From luxury city escapes to vacation rentals: These are Europe's best destinations to buy a second home
SUMMARY: Whether you're on the hunt for a vacation property or a store for your cash as stocks somersault, Europe has a host of compelling second home destinations.

TITLE: Rent prices are soaring in these 5 U.S. metros. Here's what to know before moving to a cheaper area
SUMMARY: Rent prices swelled during the first half of 2022, with a double-digit increase year-over-year. Here's what to know before moving to a cheaper area.

TITLE: China's economy could be dragged down by loss of confidence in property sector
SUMMARY: Land sales, which make up a dominant portion of provincial government revenue, have fallen 30% in the past year.

TITLE: Home prices cooled at a record pace in June, according to housing data firm
SUMMARY: Home price gains are cooling fast, as demand wanes and still-tight supply builds.

TITLE: Mortgage rates fall sharply after negative GDP report and Fed's latest hike
SUMMARY: The average rate on the popular 30-year fixed mortgage fell to 5.22% on Thursday from 5.54% on Wednesday, according to Mortgage News Daily.

TITLE: Is this a recession or not? While it's 'not entirely clear,' here's what it could mean for American consumers
SUMMARY: While the current economic doldrums may look different from previous downturns, there are certain things that remain the same.

TITLE: The cost to borrow is very expensive. Here are the best money moves to make after the Federal Reserve's interest rate hikes
SUMMARY: Everything from student loans, car loans, mortgages and credit cards will be impacted by the Fed's back-to-back 0.75-percentage-point interest rate hikes.

TITLE: Here's what the Federal Reserve's back-to-back 75-basis point interest rate hikes mean for you
SUMMARY: The Fed raised interest rates by another three-quarters of a point. Here's how that affects borrowers and savers now and down the road.

TITLE: Pending home sales fell 20% in June versus a year earlier as mortgage rates soared
SUMMARY: The decline in sales coincided with mortgage rates soaring to over 6% last month.

TITLE: Top Federal Reserve officials say they misread inflation and now plan to correct the course
SUMMARY: It's the Federal Reserve task to tame inflation that is running at a pace not seen in four decades. To do so, it has been hiking interest rates at a fast pace.

TITLE: Mortgage demand declines further, even as interest rates drop a bit
SUMMARY: Mortgage demand continues to drop, even though interest rates have come down slightly from recent highs.

TITLE: China's property sales are set to plunge 30% — worse than in 2008, S&P says
SUMMARY: China's property sales are set to plunge this year by more than they did during the 2008 financial crisis, according to new estimates from S&P Global Ratings.

TITLE: Homeowners in Singapore could soon feel the pinch from rising mortgage rates
SUMMARY: Homeowners in Singapore are starting to tighten their belts as they will soon face higher mortgages, thanks to rising interest rates.

TITLE: Millennials' average net worth more than doubled during the pandemic. Here’s what advisors say they should do next
SUMMARY: Millennials' average net worth more than doubled during the pandemic, and real estate makes up more than one-third of their financial assets.

TITLE: Homebuilders are boosting incentives as they suddenly struggle to sell homes
SUMMARY: The nation's homebuilders are now experiencing a slowdown in sales and an increase in supply.

TITLE: Home price growth slowed for the second straight month in May, S&P Case-Shiller says
SUMMARY: Home prices in May were 19.7% higher compared with the same month last year, according to the S&P CoreLogic Case-Shiller National Home Price Index.

TITLE: Goldman Sachs cuts earnings outlook for MSCI China to zero growth
SUMMARY: MSCI China tracks more than 700 China stocks listed globally, including Tencent, BYD and Industrial and Commercial Bank of China.

TITLE: How the Fed's escalating fight against inflation is hitting the hot housing market
SUMMARY: The U.S. Federal Reserve is waging an intense fight against inflation, using interest rates as its primary weapon. That has a big effect on the housing market.

TITLE: If Trump was 'Joe Blow from Kokomo,' he would have been charged with crimes, former New York prosecutor says
Fifth Wall closes half-billion-dollar climate fund to decarbonize global real estate
SUMMARY: Nearly 40% of global carbon dioxide emissions come from real estate, according to the United Nations. Fifth Wall sees a huge opportunity.

TITLE: ADB slashes China's growth forecast on concerns over strict Covid lockdowns
SUMMARY: China will need more stimulus to see any meaningful recovery for this year, according to Morgan Stanley.

TITLE: Another major interest rate hike is coming from the Federal Reserve: Here are 5 ways it could affect you
SUMMARY: The U.S. central bank has indicated another major increase in interest rates is coming as it tries to get runaway inflation in check.
